basics.name: Kritnipit Phetanan
basics.label: AI Engineer
basics.summary: AI Engineer specializing in Computer Vision and GIS. Focused on developing innovative algorithms for Change Detection, Localization, and UAV imagery analysis. GKS Scholar holding an M.S. in Environmental Science & Engineering from UNIST. Trilingual in English, Korean, and Thai.

work.name: Data Design Engineering
work.summary: Engineered navigation modules integrating VIO and VPS sensor fusion for GNSS-denied UAV localization. Developed Monocular Depth pipelines for urban/conflict damage assessment. Deployed YOLO and Feature Matching solutions for automated visual auditing workflows.

work.name: Ulsan National Institute of Science and Technology (UNIST)
work.summary: Implemented Computer Vision on Sentinel-1 SAR imagery for algal blooms and water quality monitoring. Integrated Deep Learning (LSTM) with SWAT models to enhance water quality prediction accuracy.

education.institution: Ulsan National Institute of Science and Technology (UNIST)
courses: Deep Learning for Surface Water Modeling and Monitoring in River Basins

awards.title: Outstanding Performance Award
awards.awarder: National Institute for International Education (NIIED), South Korea
awards.summary: Awarded for exceptional academic and research performance during the Global Korea Scholarship program.

awards.title: Outstanding Presentation Paper Award
awards.summary: Received for presenting innovative research on deep learning applications in hydrological modeling at the KSWE Spring Conference.

awards.title: Global Korea Scholarship (GKS)
awards.summary: Full scholarship for graduate studies covering tuition, living expenses, and research support at UNIST.

projects.name: GNSS-denied UAV Navigation System
projects.summary: Developed VIO & VPS sensor fusion framework for UAV localization using custom Extended Kalman Filter. Optimized algorithms on Raspberry Pi 5 for real-time inference.

projects.name: 3D Change Detection System
projects.summary: Developed Monocular Depth pipelines to generate DEMs for urban/conflict damage assessment. Deployed end-to-end web service via Nginx.

projects.name: Algal Blooms Monitoring
projects.summary: Implemented Computer Vision on Sentinel-1 SAR imagery for precise change detection and water resource monitoring.

projects.name: SWAT-LSTM Hydrological Modeling
projects.summary: Integrated LSTM with SWAT models to enhance water quality prediction accuracy in the Chao Phraya River Basin.
